title: 84/401/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 July 1984 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 July 1984
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC
(Only the Dutch text is authentic)
(84/401/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Having regard to Decisions of the Board of the Foundation administering the Agricultural Development and Reorganization Fund No 300 and No 304, the provisions for the implementation of Directive 72/159/EEC in the Netherlands continue to satisfy financial contribution towards the common measures referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 July 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 96, 23. 4. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 72, 15. 3. 1984, p. 24.
